title: Terramar Men's Thermolator Pants
features: What You Get: A Terramar Sports Men's Thermolator Pants that comes in all Black or Dark Loden color options. Available in the sizes: Small, Medium, Large, X-Large, and XX-Large. For a more relaxed fit, order a size up!

Made from a high quality 86% Micro Polyester and 14% Spandex combination that creates an extremely comfortable and soft base layer pants meant for all day use! Ideal for outdoor riding, hunting, hiking, skiing, snowboarding and other outdoor activities.

Features: Thermoregulation Terramar Sports Technology that keeps you comfortable in all conditions and engineered to adjust to your body temperature due to our custom ClimaSense technology that helps control your body temperature!

ClimaSense is a propriety fabric technology formulated to adapt to an active bodyâ€™s changing physiology. A number of factors influence the skins surface temperature. Key among them are the outside weather conditions and the activity level.

How to Wash: Washer and dryer safe! Machine wash cold with like colors and only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low. Do not iron. To keep it in perfect shape for as long as possible, we recommend hang drying.
description: Designed for high energy outdoor adventures, our Thermolator Series is engineered to stretch and move with you for your various active lifestyles. From climbing up to the snowiest peaks to early morning runs in the city, these garments are enhanced with ClimaSense thermal regulation technology to enhance your comfort. Terramar's Thermolator line has high loft grid channels to create an ideal climate that efficiently traps air and effectively allows circulation. The grid construction was created to trap air for added warmth between layers and transport moisture. Each product has a smooth face fleeced back, easy layering, sustainable, quick drying, moisture management and UPF protection.
